sourcesContent:
import axios from 'axios'; import React,{useState} from 'react' import {Tab,Row,Col,Nav,Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import { DynDropDown } from './dynDropDown' export const GenerateCOFeedback = () => { const [academicYear, setAcademicYear] = useState('') const [semester, setSemester] = useState('') const [courseDetails, setCourseDetails] = useState('') const [response, setResponse] = useState('') const sendFeedback = async() => { var data = { facultyUserName: window.sessionStorage.getItem('username'), academicYear: academicYear, semester: semester, courseId: courseDetails.split('-')[1], courseName: courseDetails.split('-')[0], } console.log(data); const { data: res } = await axios.post('addFeedBack', data) setResponse(res.message) } return (<>
Faculty DashBoard
Generate Course CO Feedback

{ response }

{setAcademicYear(val)}} label='year'/>
{setSemester(val)}} label='semesters'/>
{ setCourseDetails(val) }} label='courseDetails' />
Work In Progress
) }
